title: Pixel 4XL battery indicator has intermittent question mark. Rebooted. Android wouldnt start up
content: Battery indicator shows a question mark.  Rebooted, but Android failed to start. Received notice that cell may be corrupted.  Tried about 10 times, finally restarted.  But question mark came back until I recharged.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
